hard_constraints.description: Every drone mission must have a clear starting point; therefore, we must enforce that the drone is positioned at location 1 at the beginning of the timeline (time 0).
The drone's movement is restricted by physical connections; we must ensure that for every move between two consecutive time steps, the locations are connected by an edge in the network.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T), time(T+1).

hard_constraints.description: To successfully complete the scanning objective, the drone must visit location 3 at least once during its flight path.
To satisfy all mission requirements, we must verify that the drone reaches location 4 at some point within the allocated 5 time units.
